section.title: Description
section.p: Secondary index are created and built through the Query service with the N1QL (pronounced "nickel") tool.
section.codeblock: CREATE INDEX strongbooze ON beer-samples(abv, brewery) USING GSI WHERE type=“brewery” WITH `{"nodes”: [“node2”, “node4”], “defer_build”:true}`
section.p: The “deployment” parameter and the value must be opaque to N1QL and to be understood only by the specific index type, GSI in above example.

In the above example, the opaque part is specifying that the index is to be build on node2 and node 4, and it must hold off building until an explicit BUILD INDEXES command specifies to build this index if defer_build parameter is set as true. If defer_build is false, create index will also initiate index build immediately.
